name: ARK: Survival Evolved Player Profile File

description: The ARKPROFILE file is one of 3 save files that ARK: Survival Evolved gamers commonly encounter. The .ARK file contains information about a world and the .ARKTRIBE file contains information about a tribe of players.
ARKPROFILE files are saved by default by Steam installations of ARK: Survival Evolved in the following Windows directory:

common_filenames.description: [SteamID].arkprofile - The name given to ARKPROFILE files is the Steam ID of the individual player.
